snippet: J.D. Biersdorfer and Brian X. Chen answer questions about the coming iPhone 7 and 7 Plus, and the new Apple Watch.
abstract: Tech Tip Q&A on Apple's new iPhones and smartwatches.

headline.main: Readers Ask About Appleâ€™s New iPhone and Watch
headline.print_headline: About Those Wireless Headphones, and Other Apple Accessories

byline.original: By J. D. BIERSDORFER and BRIAN X. CHEN

snippet: Stocks that moved substantially or traded heavily Thursday:

headline.main: Apple, Goodyear and Noble Energy Rise; Wells Fargo Slumps
headline.print_headline: Apple, Goodyear and Noble Energy Rise; Wells Fargo Slumps

snippet: If the fallout from a huge EU tax bill handed to Apple includes a push to encourage U.S. firms to bring more profits onshore, recent history suggests the impact for the dollar can only be positive.

headline.main: Apple Tax Row Raises $2.1 Trillion Question for Forex Traders
headline.print_headline: Apple Tax Row Raises $2.1 Trillion Question for Forex Traders

snippet: Apple Inc and other U.S. multinationals will face new curbs on tax loopholes under a rule imposed by Washington on Thursday, part of a scramble among governments worldwide to bolster their corporate tax bases.

headline.main: U.S. Tax Avoidance Clampdown a Potential Headache for Apple
headline.print_headline: U.S. Tax Avoidance Clampdown a Potential Headache for Apple

snippet: Wall Street rallied 1 percent on Thursday, buoyed by Apple's best four-day run since 2014, higher oil prices and ho-hum economic data that further dimmed expectations for an interest rate hike next week.

headline.main: Wall Street Surges on Lower Rate-Hike Fears, Apple Ascends
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Surges on Lower Rate-Hike Fears, Apple Ascends

snippet: Apple Inc and Alphabet Inc's Google engage in practices that undermine competition in the smartphone app market, an advisory panel to Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry alleged on Thursday.

headline.main: Japan Government Advisory Panel Says Apple, Google Hinder App Competition
headline.print_headline: Japan Government Advisory Panel Says Apple, Google Hinder App Competition

snippet: Initial quantities of the iPhone 7 Plus have sold out globally as Apple Inc prepares to roll out its new gadget in stores, the company said Wednesday.

headline.main: Apple Says Initial Quantities of iPhone 7 Plus Sold Out
headline.print_headline: Apple Says Initial Quantities of iPhone 7 Plus Sold Out

snippet: Apple extended its Wall Street rally on Thursday, with enthusiasm over demand for its newest iPhone putting the stock on track for its strongest four-day streak in over two years and clobbering short sellers who bet against it.

headline.main: Apple Stock Heads for Best Four Days Since 2014; Short Sellers Flee
headline.print_headline: Apple Stock Heads for Best Four Days Since 2014; Short Sellers Flee

snippet: Online radio service Pandora Media Inc launched "Pandora Plus", its new subscription service, on Thursday as it looks to gain market share amid stiff competition from Apple Inc, Spotify and Amazon.com Inc.

headline.main: Pandora Launches New Radio Service 'Pandora Plus'
headline.print_headline: Pandora Launches New Radio Service 'Pandora Plus'

snippet: Pandora said it has revamped its $5 a month Internet radio service, giving listeners the ability to skip and replay more songs.

headline.main: Pandora Revamps Its $5 a Month Radio Service
headline.print_headline: Pandora Revamps Its $5 a Month Radio Service
